item.title: Bible Verse Tooltip Demo
item.description: Option #1 refTagger # <script> var refTagger = { settings: { bibleVersion: "hlybblsmpshndtn" /*'KJV'*/ } }; (function(d, t) { var n=d.querySelector('[nonce]'); refTagger.settings.nonce = n && (n.nonce||n.getAttribute('nonce')); var g = d.createElement(t), s = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0]; g.src = 'https://api.reftagger.com/v2/RefTagger.js'; g.nonce = refTagger.settings.nonce; s.parentNode.insertBefore(g, s); }(document, 'script')); </script> <cite class="bibleref" title="" ></cite> Example #1：Obadiah 1:3 Example #2：<cite class="bibleref" title="Psalms 48:1-14" >诗四十八</cite> var refTagger = { settings: { bibleVersion: "hlybblsmpshndtn" /*'KJV'*/ } }; (function(d, t) { var n=d.
